alert.note: Alert for Barron; Chippewa; Dunn; Eau Claire; Pepin; Pierce; Polk; Rusk; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 4:21PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...DANGEROUSLY COLD WIND CHILLS OVER THE NEXT FEW DAYS... .Dangerous wind chills are expected to last through Tuesday morning, with widespread values of 25 to 40 degrees below zero. A Wind Chill Warning is in effect for western Minnesota tonight through Monday morning. A Wind Chill Advisory is in effect for eastern Minnesota and western Wisconsin tonight through Monday morning. After Monday morning, Wind Chill Advisories continue across Minnesota through Tuesday morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Limit the amount of time pets stay outdoors and ensure livestock have a warm place to reside.
